data.name: Chain Breaker
data.passiveDescription: For every party member from Natlan or who has a different Elemental Type from the equipping character, the equipping character gains {{4.8//6//7.2//8.4//9.6%}} increased ATK. When there are no less than 3 of the aforementioned characters, the equipping character gains {{24//30//36//42//48}} Elemental Mastery.
